actions.recommendation: BP is slightly elevated. Monitor this closely as dose adjustment of your medication may be needed.
Prostate screening becomes important after the age of 40. Frequent urination, straining to pass urine, dribbling & more night time waking are some signs of prostate disease. Look out for these.
Invest in practices that improve your mental health, seek out the support you need timeously.
Monitor your BP & ensure that it is well controlled. A Mediterranean type diet will improve your cholesterol levels.
